snippet: This year, The New York Times is replacing its copy of the Declaration of Independence with a higher-resolution one, accompanied for the first time by a transcription.
lead_paragraph: This year, The New York Times is replacing its copy of the Declaration of Independence with a higher-resolution one, accompanied for the first time by a transcription.

headline.main: The New York Times’ Prints of the Declaration of Independence From 2011 and 2012
